meanings.definition: The particular character or qualities that distinguish one person or thing from others.
meanings.sent1: Each person has their own individualities that make them special.
meanings.sent2: The individualities of each snowflake make them unique.
meanings.sent3: The individualities of the quirky cat always bring a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: The individualities of the stars in the night sky shine brightly.
meanings.sent5: The individualities of the puzzle pieces make them fit together perfectly.

meanings.definition: The distinctive or unique features or characteristics of a person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The artist's individualities were evident in every brushstroke.
meanings.sent2: The individualities of the rare flower made it stand out in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The individualities of the old house added charm to the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The individualities of the melody lingered in the air long after the music stopped.
meanings.sent5: The individualities of the mountain range were breathtaking to behold.
